name: Life of Bear
description:
Welcome to Life of Bear! Ever wondered what it'd be like to be a black bear? Roaming the forest, mauling hunters, bunnies and deer? Well here is your chance! Your hungry, and thirsty and you have to keep that hunger and thirst down to stay alive. All the while dodging hunters! How long will you survive??

  • CONTROLS: 
  • USE WASD TO MOVE OR ARROW KEYS
  • USE SPACEBAR TO SLASH YOUR PAWS AT ENEMIES
  • RUN DIRECTLY AT THE LAKE TO LOWER YOUR THIRST

Social Medias:

Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/Life-Of-Bear-113616187895545

UPDATE:v.1

  1. Hunters will now spawn more frequently as time goes on
  2. Added Coyotes! They will hunt down your potential prey and take it for themselves! Kill them!
  3. Fixed some bugs regarding hunger stats
  4. Adjusted the way the bear paw attack looks and feels
  5. adjusted some sound effects
  6. You will grow bigger the more you eat! But if you start to starve, you will become smaller!
